_sText: Medium difficulty obstacle course comprised of 3 sections: Main area, basement / sewer thing, and underground / cave. 30 second spawnkiller. 120 frags award on completion. Special thanks to El NIÑO (>^o^)>™.

----------------------------------------------

This is the fixed fix version for mg[underscore]noggot[underscore]course. Why is it fixed fix? Well because the fixed version screwed up to!

----------------------------------------------

Fixed:
- Removed boring textures and added new

- Added music

- Made the map longer

- Modified some places

- Pakrate'd it

-----------------------------------------

Hope you enjoy this map, please report any buggs to me etc... Don't forget to rate or comment on you'r thoughts about this map! Everyfeedback I could get is counting!
And if you're having any ideas that I could add to the map, please tell me in the comment section below or PM me. And of course do you get on the Special thanks list!

How to install the maps.
When you've downloaded the file you open winrar and find the file. Then you extract the bsp. file into C/steam/steamapps/username/counterstrikesource/cstrike/maps
And then you just open CSS and finds the map in Create a server and you can play the map.

Marines VS Predators
====================
This map is a remake of my original mvp_ambushed map. The only thing I have changed is the mvp plugin configs so the map does it all, meaning the only plugin required (which included in pack) is the radar remover.

When the map is loaded, the radar will automatically be removed from all clients for the duration of the map. Once the map is finished, the plugin will unload and it will be business as usual.

The objective of the map is for Ts (predators) to hunt the CTs (marines) and vice versa. CTs will be equipped with the latest in weapons and night vision, and the Ts will have heightened speed, health and regeneration. They also be nearly invisible.

The best ratio for this game is 1 predator for every 4 marines.

To install, just extract to your cstrike folder and overwrite any existing files.

Be sure to reload server before after installing this map or the models will not work correctly when its played.

Mg_Mustang -------------- Let me first say a big thanks to NatalyaAF for the awsome mustang prefab. There are 10 blue and 10 red mustangs attached to a M3. Each person gets a shotgun and gets a speed boost from each car. Go around driving and shooting people in the mini city. There are 2 hidden cars and 4 smoke grenades around the map that give you extra speed and also increase the speed that you walk. Map made by MiniGames Community Studio! There are a few map secrets; theres 1 hidden button for each door for the orange mustangs. Also theres a series of 3 buttons that must be pressed in order to break the gate near the smokes. Thanks Paul_Deagle (aka [SG] Paul)

Mg_Multi_Storm

Made for www.stormgaming.co.uk

Minigame map containing 24 Minigames all in one

One player at round start chooses which minigame to play out of the 24

Minigames include
+ Glass maps
+ Surf
+ Ice
+ Grenade fights
+ Target shooting
+ Crazy lifts
+ Boats

To name but a few, a very nice variety, some silly, some serious, all fun!

Map is big but as it's divided into 24 areas there are no problems there

NoBlock is absolutly required, unlimited ammo is recommended.

_aChangeLog.text: A level is chosen randomly 30 seconds after the round starts.
The turnstile at the spawn now stops  when a player is teleported to the choice room.

_sText:
This map is the first one I started, on january 2014. I stopped this map for more than 2 years and I finally decided to finish it (at least release a beta).
I didn't put a lot of efforts on the design, this map is aimed to be fun to play.

10 levels :
  • Foot
  • Beach Volley
  • Waterpolo
  • Minigolf
  • Hurdle Course
  • Ice Hockey
  • Beach Soccer
  • Iceskate
  • Dodgeball
  • Ski

Damages are disabled (including fall damage), except for Hurdle Course, Minigolf and Ski.
Fall damage is disabled for Iceskate.
Music list :
  • Can't Hold Us - Macklemore
  • Summer Moonlight - Bob Sinclar
  • Stay The Night - Zedd
  • Right Round - Florida
  • Chocobo Battle (from the game FFVII)
  • Levels - Avicii
  • Summer - Calvin Harris
  • Paradise - Coldplay (Fedde Le Grand remix)
  • And We Danced - Macklemore
  • Sugar - Robin Schulz

Change Log

b1 --> b1_2
Minor fixes

Fixed ERROR ball

b1_2 --> b1_3
Fixed missing textures on the ball

b1_3 --> b2
Added 3 more levels :
  • Iceskate
  • Dodgeball
  • Ski
Deactivation of the opponent trigger when a goal is scored

Possibility to turn off the musics (Music Volume on Options)

b2 --> b2_1
Deleted the CT spawn on the Ski

Minor fixes on the trigger_hurt on Waterpolo

Made a few structural changes to improve FPS.

As CT: RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!

There is also a little easteregg...
For Installation: just copy the bsp file in your cstrike\maps folder...nuthin more
Enjoy!

This is a whole new kind of game! MG_MK stands for mini-game mortal kombat!

MK will be the new favourite mod/game-type for all fun servers!



Objective:
Punch enemies into traps, monsters, fire, bombs and other deadly stuff!

Controls:
LMB: punch forward
RMB: uppercut


It's a fast pace adrenaline rush, with laughs guaranteed!



Mg_mk_colosseum_x is the first in a line of upcoming MK maps! Two teams fight off in a deadly arena filled with traps. Punch your foe into one of the many spiked walls, punch em into a large fire and see them burn to death. Or perhaps you want to let a giant dune shark or antguard do your dirty work for you. MADNESS? THIS... IS... SPAAARTAAAA!


music is not my own:
Matrix Reloaded - High Way Chase Theme
Inception - Main Theme
Sparta quote: 300


If you want prefabs, PM me on this forum:
http://forum.i3d.net/cs-source-work-progress/120708-fight-map-3.html

MG_MK_ABSTRACT BY UNREAL MG_MK stands for mini-game mortal kombat, this is the second map to be released on other upcoming maps of its style. This game-mod basicly consists in punching your enemies down. In this map I was looking forward to make something fun, actractive and not boring to play, its a random simetrical platform, with two ramps on each side that boost players, and a healing thingy on the top platform and it is reachable as long as bunnyhopping is enabled. Note: Knife damage was removed on this level, so punching is the only way to kill enemies. I hope you guys like it and have fun! www.FRAGXL.com
